CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION: Default channel contains stable releases. Latest channel contains new features and bug fixes.
DOWNGRADE_CONFIRM: I understand the risks of downgrading firmware
DOWNGRADE_INFO_TEXT: If you need to downgrade your bootloader firmware, please refer to the official Raspberry Pi documentation at: https://www.raspberrypi.com/documentation/computers/raspberry-pi.html#raspberry-pi-4-boot-eeprom
